title: Ranking the 8 Remaining Playoff Quarterbacks plus Devonta Smith's Pro Potential & Andre Johnson blasts the Texans (Football 1/13)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn for the appropriately named "Brady Quinn Football Show." The guys first address Andre Johnson's comments about the Texans organization and continue to comment on how the situation in Houston has devolved (1:30). Then, they take a look at the National Championship Game through the lens of the NFL Draft (8:30). Devonta Smith balled all season and dominated on the biggest stage in the title game, so how high can he go in April? Top 5 is certainly within reach and more likely than not. But how will the competition of Ja'Marr Chase and Jaylen Waddle impact team's decision-making? Brady also breaks down Mac Jones' game and who else from Alabama and Ohio State to monitor through the draft process. Next, Brinson and BQ rank the 8 quarterbacks remaining in the postseason based on their ability to lead their teams' to a Super Bowl victory this season (31:00). Spoiler: they don't have the same #1 choice.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @Brady_Quinn, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
